page.title: 13HOME LIFE IN HINXWORTH (2)
page.content: A WORKING WOMAN'S VIEW: I am a married woman with a daughter of 23,I've lived here for 13 years.My husband and I own and work in two shops in Stevenage. Since I work most days most of my soc- ial activities take place in the even- ings I belong to the W.I.and am on the Village Hall management committee.Also I do Keep Fit and craft classes.I shop in Stevenage and do housework on my day off on Friday.I enjoy living here and find there are plenty of opportun- ities to get involved in village life. A HOUSEWIFE'S VIEW:My day is very busy what with having to walk the two dogs, get my 3 year old son David ready for play school in Ashwell and my husband off to work by 8:30 am.I clean the pub in the morning, amuse my son in the afternoon and once a week lead a Brow- nie pack.My husband works a 5 1/2 day week so we only have Sundays together.
